mission.posting: Learn debug commands that can make starting and testing your extension easier.

email.subject: Debug Commands
email.body:
To Autostart your mod while in development, start Hacknet with the argument -extstart [YOUR_MOD_FOLDERNAME]
To start Hacknet on your second monitor, if you have one, use the argument -altmonitor
You probably also want to develop with force complete on: -enablefc
Debug commands too: -enabledebug
Once you have Debug commands enabled:
fh Instantly breaks into any computer
dscan [ID] reveals a computer by ID name
ra reveals everything on the netmap at once
reloadext reloads all the nodes in the current extension from source files, and updates them in the current save.
